title: Toxic people flaming all game desever chat ban
body: pls ban the ww and karthus from my last game they were trolling then started saying was a troll even tho i carryed early

replies.body: I did i just want them to get noticed
If you were in the match with them while they were being toxic or trolling, the best way to get their account noticed would be to submit an official report through the post game lobby.
You have to report them during the end screen. Asking them to be banned here won't do you any good.
